page.title: 03THE BUTCHERS SHOP
page.content: THE BUTCHERS SHOP IS OPEN FIVE AND A HALF DAYS A WEEK .THEY ARE OPEN FROM EIGHT TILL FIVE.THEY HAVE A MOBILE VAN WHICH COVERS A SIX MILE RADIUS.THEY SELL BEEF/MUTTON/SAUSAGE/PIES/POULTRY DRIPPING/BLACK PUDDING/POLONY/SCOTCH EGGS/FAGGOTS/BACON/EGGS/MILK AND FROZEN FOODS.MR.FAWCETT'S DAUGHTER MAKES THE PIES.THE HEAVIEST MEAT IS BEEF AND BEEF IS ALSO THE DEAREST.HE KILLS BEAST,LAMBS AND PIGS. THE OFFAL GOES IN A CONTAINER AND THE FAT AND BONES GO IN A WAGON. HE BUYS THE ANIMALS FROM STOKESLEY MART AND SOMETIMES FROM FARMS. WHEN HE GETS THEM HOME HE SLAUGHTERS THEM AND PUTS THEM IN THE COLD ROOMS.
